title: Riot, is this a possible fix?
body: So, the RollerButtonSpeed fix for mouse zoom doesn't work anymore in recent patches. Is there any way "zoom in" and "zoom out" could be added control menu and bound to keystrokes? Or maybe a + and - button over the minimap?

replies.body: It looks like the zoom function are keys reserved for the scroll wheel.  To be sure, I tinkered around and wasn't able to find any keyboard functions.  To help troubleshoot, try and use another mouse to see if the issue is with the mouse and rule out possibilities.  Let me know if swapping the mouse fixes this!
